overview: Lola Barth is a beautiful transgender person with a very intense past. She has been in a relationship with her boyfriend Johnathan for about five years. They lived together, and about a year ago, they started the adoption process. To become a mother is the biggest dream of Lola, and she is willing to do everything possible. Her boyfriend Johnathan, who has always been close to her has a different opinion about it. He feels unsure of being a father, but he continues to proceed in order to make Lola happy. The situation changes when there is a real possibility to take a child into foster care, a child who has been refused by different families.
title: Lola
